verses.verse: <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H157>loves<s%> the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%> more than all the <S%H4908>dwellings<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>

I will <S%H2142>record<s%> <S%H7294>Rahab<s%> and <S%H894>Babylon<s%> among those who <S%H3045>acknowledge<s%> <S%H6429>me.<s%> Behold, Philistia, <S%H6865>Tyre,<s%> and also <S%H3568>Ethiopia:<s%> "This one was born <S%H3205>there.<s%>"
<S%H6726>Yes,<s%> of Zion it will be <S%H559>said,<s%> "This one and that <S%H376>one<s%> was <S%H3205>born<s%> in <S%H5945>her;<s%>" the Most High himself will establish <S%H3559>her.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H5608>count,<s%> when he writes <S%H3789>up<s%> the <S%H5971>peoples,<s%> "This one was <S%H3205>born<s%> <S%H5542>there.<s%>" Selah.
Those who <S%H7891>sing<s%> as well as those who <S%H2490>dance<s%> <S%H4599>say,<s%> "All my springs are in you."
